# Roadmap

## Completed

### v1.0 - MVP
- Parser system (verb+noun)
- World system (rooms, items, inventory)
- Main game loop with demo world

### v2.0 - World Scripting
- .world file format
- World loader with validation
- Save/load system with slots
- Multi-word item support
- 4 complete playable worlds

### v3.0 - Multiplayer Foundation
- Session management
- Player roles (6 roles)
- IPC system
- Tmux integration
- Campaign system

## In Progress

### v3.1 - Integration
- Connect multiplayer infrastructure to game engine
- Real-time state synchronization
- Player actions broadcast

## Planned

### v4.0 - Gameplay Enhancements
- NPC dialogue system
- Locked doors requiring keys
- Item usage system (use key on door)
- Conditional exits and triggers

### v5.0 - Scripting
- Event handlers in world files
- Custom game logic
- Variables and state tracking

## Long-term Vision

- Web-based multiplayer frontend
- World editor tool
- Community world sharing
